channel.title: Help with DeltaScape Source
channel.description:
Well, I've gotten some help from here before, I tried searching google and found a few guides that explained this but none worked on Delta source so far.
I was wondering if anyone knew how to change the maximum levels, maximum combat & maximum money on a deltascape source? The current maximum level is 99, maximum combat 126 (of course) and the maximum money or item amount is 999,999,999.
Sorry to bother anyone with this question, but thanks to anyone who is able to help me or give me some information.
Clay.

item.title: Help with DeltaScape Source
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

If you are going to change the max money to the max of an Integer please DONT type 2147483647. Use Integer.MAX_VALUE.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with DeltaScape Source
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Max money - Search ‘999999999’ in player.java.
Max stat levels - Search ‘return 99;’ for a while in client.java
The combat level will change as you change the max stat level, unless you change the combat formula which is located in player.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with DeltaScape Source
item.dc:creator: @Razr1 Razr`
item.description:
@Razr1 wrote:

Did you search for 999999999 in the files?

Read full topic

item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

I’ve searched and tried editing, but didn’t work. Still kept them all at the same, I’m not that great with DeltaScape source, lol.

Read full topic

Have you tried looking through the source to find where these things are set?
